snippet.title: No Buddy, no problem for Swans
snippet.content: SYDNEY has cemented its place in the top eight with a thumping win over Geelong at Simonds Stadium. The insult - it was the Cats' biggest loss at home since 2006 - was compounded by an injury to captain Joel Selwood. The Cats' top-two hopes have also taken a blow and they could slide to fourth depending on results this weekend. FIND OUT IN OUR LIVE BLOG BELOW Originally published as
